import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Lightbox from 'react-image-lightbox'; const images = [ require('../../images/gallery/gallery1.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery2.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery3.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery4.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery5.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery6.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery7.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery8.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery9.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery10.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery11.jpg'), require('../../images/gallery/gallery12.jpg'), ] class GalleryGridTwo extends Component { state = { photoIndex: 0, isOpenImage: false } render() { const { photoIndex, isOpenImage } = this.state; return (
{isOpenImage && ( this.setState({ isOpenImage: false })} onMovePrevRequest={() => this.setState({ photoIndex: (photoIndex + images.length - 1) % images.length, }) } onMoveNextRequest={() => this.setState({ photoIndex: (photoIndex + 1) % images.length, }) } /> )}
